butcher.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone who owns or works in a shop that sells meat
butcher.translation[0].definitions[1].de: someone who has killed someone else cruelly and unnecessarily, especially someone who has killed a lot of people
butcher.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to kill animals and prepare them to be used as meat
butcher.translation[1].definitions[1].de: to kill someone cruelly or unnecessarily, especially to kill a lot of people
butcher.translation[1].definitions[2].de: to spoil something by working carelessly
butcher.translation[1].definitions[2].ex: That hairdresser really butchered my hair!
